name: Get to the Chopper! (DigitalStimulation)
description:
Get to the chopper without touching anything or jumping to achieve a Flawless Victory!

How to Install:

  1. Run Setup.exe

  2. Choose the parent folder to which you want to install the game and click Extract.

    The game will be installed within the Get to the Chopper! folder at the selected folder.

  3. Run Get to the Chopper!.exe
